artist_name: Bryan Scary and the Shredding Tears
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Imitation of the Sky is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Imitation of the Sky has sections analyzed in the following keys: G♯ Dorian, D♭ Major,  and A♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
